abstract: A paramedic tries to comfort one of the passengers aboard a helicopter that crashed into the East River.
snippet: A paramedic tries to comfort one of the passengers aboard a helicopter that crashed into the East River.
lead_paragraph: Anita Torres has been running to the scenes of disasters and tending to the ill and the injured for 10 years. So when she got the call to go to the scene of the helicopter crash in the East River on Tuesday, adrenaline and a sort of muscle memory took over, pushing her emotions to the back.

headline.main: Caring for a Crash Victim Who Wants Only to See His Family
